page.title: 07EDUCATION (CONTINUED)
page.content:
PE or assembly is when in the morning our teacher reads a story, we sing a hymn and have a prayer and then on a Wednesday we do PE which is when we leap over things and do handstands.
We do go out on outings to see things like the Church and old houses then we go back to school and write and draw what we saw.It is much more fun than just writing out of books the same thing every day. We are at school for six hours 9am-3pm five days a week. Juliet Burridge We have lots of playground games.The most popular is called punchball.You have two teams.The fielding team has a bowler and backstop.The bowler throws the ball and an opponent has to hit the ball.To be out you are caught or hit by the ball. BY RICHARD HOBART.
